DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether intranasal oxytocin effective comparison placebo improve female sexual dysfunction pre- postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Chronic Intranasal Oxytocin Administration Sexual Function Pre- Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Willingness attempt sexual intercourse and/ masturbation least two time per week Ongoing relationship least 3 month Female subject age 40 year , Male subject must older 18 The participation study free choice male partner Willingness perform pregnancy test every month ( premenopausal subject ) Willingness use contraception study period ( premenopausal subject ) Normal finding urogenital tract unless investigator considers abnormality clinically irrelevant Normal laboratory value unless investigator considers abnormality clinically irrelevant Normal finding medical history physical examination unless investigator considers abnormality clinically irrelevant Primary sexual dysfunction sexual abuse severe psychiatric disease untreated condition medication intake associate reduction sexual function . In male partner : severe andrological relate medical problem .
